content:
graphic by Jacob Newman

Jake Havoc is a comic strip written and illustrated by Jacob Newman PERIOD Through homage and parody it attempts to poke fun at the sometimes absurd nature of our daily lives while celebrating American culture and iconography PERIOD You can find Jacob Newmans work on Instagram jakehavoc PERIOD

Jacob Newman is a senior from Milwaukee Wisconsin PERIOD You can contact him at jane3083colorado.edu

Jacob Newman is a senior from Milwaukee Wisconsin studying Advertising PERIOD His art spans many different mediums from illustration to photography to film PERIOD He likes to pay homage to American culture through his work PERIOD When he is not making art he is often watching movies distance running and spending time with his cat Tofu PERIOD
